name: Zampabolas
description: Zampabolas is an unofficial conversion of the classic board game called Hungry Hungry Hippos. The game has only a multiplayer mode (2 to 4 players), and doesn't feature an AI computer player. Players can choose between 2 boards, and can play a 10, 20 or 30 ball game.
alsoFor: Amstrad CPC, DOS, MSX | Combined View

shot.caption: This screen displays while the game is loading
The next screen is the main game menu
This is the start of the game. Balls appear and bounce around the table...
Players press their designated key and try to capture a ball. Here the yellow player stands a good chance of capturing this ball.
The yellow player caught the ball and their score - over on the right - has increased
Now the green player has a ball. The numbers in the lower right are a countdown timer and the number of balls remaining
The game continues until all balls have been captured or the timer has run out. Then the final scores are displayed. From here the player(s) are taken back to the main game menu
